resources.string:
1:Wait for loading OCR. 
2:Select camera from MENU for instant result. After taking picture press save button. After saving, crop the text area and again press save button. A screen will open to set cutting characters. After adjusting trackbar press process button to get text. 
3:Select Gallery from mobile to get the image from gallery or any saved image in mobile and follow the same camera flow steps 
4:After getting text you will be able to speak it by pressing speak button or go back to menu
